body.description: This workflow is used by the Admin UI to retract all publications of an event upon deletion
body.title: Delete

body.description:
Delete all media related to this event, keeping the metadata and publishing a placeholder video instead.
    The original media will be unrecoverable.
body.title: Delete event, publish a placeholder instead

body.description:
A minimal workflow that transcodes the media into serverless HLS distribution formats, then
    sends the resulting distribution files, along with their associated metadata,
    to the distribution channels.
body.title: Fast HLS Testing Workflow

body.description:
A minimal workflow that transcodes the media into distribution formats, then
    sends the resulting distribution files, along with their associated metadata,
    to the distribution channels.
body.title: Fast Testing Workflow

body.description: A minimal Workflow that only publishes a Mediapackage
body.title: Import Mediapackage and Publish without reencode

body.description: A complex workflow, showcasing most of Opencast's features.
body.title: Process upon upload and schedule

body.description: A simple and fast workflow for publishing videos created by Opencast Studio.
body.title: Studio Upload

body.description:
Update or create the preview video, the waveforms and the thumbnails
    on the internal publication channel for use by the video editor.
body.title: Update editor previews
